imdb.plot outline: Go to an event with large crowds is always fun, but that all right exit, the police need to be aware. In the "Show Police" you know the great schemes used by the police to ensure the safety of the public at large shows and events that bring together more than 60.000 people.
imdb.title: Show de Polícia
plot: Go to an event with large crowds is always fun, but that all right exit, the police need to be aware. In the "Show Police" you know the great schemes used by the police to ensure the safety of the public at large shows and events that bring together more than 60.000 people.::Ribeiro, Beto (II)
